a.h1: Gilman School District Home of the Pirates

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
Announcements for April 13, 2020
Office hours and staffing are limited during the "Safer at Home" order. The general voice mailbox will be monitored daily, please leave a message and we will...

h3.a: Watch the Gilman Staff Video to Their Students!

div.p: We are asking all families in the district to take this survey. The intent of the survey is to help us determine internet connectivity and how families would like to receive their homework packets...
Due to the weather, there will be no food delivery today. (4/13/2020)
We will light up our football field at 8 p.m, tomorrow night, April 10 for 20 minutes. This is in honor of all our Gilman Pirate athletes. view image

This is a message from the School District of Gilman regarding the week of April 7, 2020.
Student activity packets will be delivered on Thursday April 9
The meal program will not be offered on Friday, April 10
Office hours and staffing are limited during the “Safer at Home” order. The general voice mailbox will be monitored daily, please leave a message and we will return your call. Office visits will be by appointment only.
A new link has been added under “Resources” on the district’s COVID-19 webpage called the “Assignment Tracker” to inform parents/guardians of their student’s assignments and activities for the school week.
Thank you

Any student that wishes to check out books can email Mrs. Gallett and she can get them ready to go home with your packets from your teachers. To find a book: Go to our district web page and click on Menu - then click on Our Students - then click on Library Resources - then click on Gilman School and then you can search for a book. In your email please include the book name and the call number. dgallett@gilman.k12.wi.us view image

p.a: Event: Last Day of School - 1/2 day
